      • workingDirectory

        public Command.Builder workingDirectory(java.io.File workingDirectory)
        Sets the working directory from which the command will be executed. This must be a local directory; Commands run on remote devices (ie. via adb shell) require a local working directory.

      • permitNonZeroExitStatus

        public Command.Builder permitNonZeroExitStatus()
        Prevents execute() from throwing if the invoked process returns a nonzero exit code.
